scripts.start: ng build shared-ui && concurrently "npm run start:remotes" "npm run start:shell:wait"
scripts.start:remotes: concurrently "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:employee" "npm run start:researcher"
scripts.start:shell:wait: wait-on http://localhost:4201 http://localhost:4202 http://localhost:4203 && npm run start:shell
scripts.dev: ng build shared-ui && concurrently "npm run watch:shared-ui" "npm run start"
scripts.dev:admin: ng build shared-ui && concurrently "npm run watch:shared-ui" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:shell:wait:admin"
scripts.dev:employee: ng build shared-ui && concurrently "npm run watch:shared-ui" "npm run start:employee" "npm run start:shell:wait:employee"
scripts.dev:researcher: ng build shared-ui && concurrently "npm run watch:shared-ui" "npm run start:researcher" "npm run start:shell:wait:researcher"
scripts.build:all: ng build shared-ui && ng build remote-admin && ng build remote-employee && ng build remote-researcher && ng build shell
scripts.build:production: ng build shared-ui --configuration production && ng build remote-admin --configuration production && ng build remote-employee --configuration production && ng build remote-researcher --configuration production && ng build shell --configuration production
scripts.test:all: ng test shell && ng test remote-admin && ng test remote-employee && ng test remote-researcher
